# Churchtown Media

> North West digital growth agency specializing in Next.js web design and data-driven SEO. Based in Southport, serving Liverpool, Manchester, Preston, and the wider UK.

## About

Churchtown Media builds high-performance websites and SEO strategies for businesses across the North West. We use Next.js, React, and Vercel to deliver sub-second page loads, 90+ Lighthouse scores, and measurable traffic growth. Family-run agency with 15+ years in SEO and 20+ years in web development.

## Services

- [Web Design](https://www.churchtownmedia.co.uk/services/web-design): Enterprise Next.js websites from £2,500
- [SEO](https://www.churchtownmedia.co.uk/services/seo): Data-driven SEO packages from £500/month
- [Small Business](https://www.churchtownmedia.co.uk/services/small-business): Professional websites from £1,500
- [Content Scaling](https://www.churchtownmedia.co.uk/services/content-scaling): 100+ programmatic SEO pages in 48 hours
- [Headless Development](https://www.churchtownmedia.co.uk/services/headless-development): WordPress to Next.js migration
